serviceSliders.title: Online ticket system
serviceSliders.development: Coffee or tea, Fight for the pandemic. Our online queuing system can help to keep distance.

serviceSliders.title: SMS notifications
serviceSliders.development: System auto send SMS to notifications customer come back to centre.

serviceSliders.title: Real time Supervise
serviceSliders.development: Any time any where supervise queuing and counter status.

serviceSliders.title: Report for data analysis
serviceSliders.development: Analysis queuing data, find out the best manpower arrangement.

serviceSliders.title: One system multiple branch
serviceSliders.development: Support multiple branch. Centralize settings including staff login, supervision, access data for analysis between branches etc.

serviceSliders.title: One ticket for multiple counter
serviceSliders.development: Set the flow tailor to your centre for example, one ticket to queue for Information counter -> cashier counter

serviceSliders.title: Voice announement
serviceSliders.development: Support Cantonese, English, Mandarin and Portuguese voice announcement, make sure anyone are notified by a familiar language

serviceSliders.title: Out of Paper notification
serviceSliders.development: Noifity ticket printer paper near-end / paper out.
